description: Iran's supreme leader appeared at Friday prayers in Tehran and said Iran would not hesitate to attack Israel again after this week's missile barrage. The civilian death toll grew in Lebanon as Israel continued its airstrikes in Beirut aimed at Hezbollah. NBC News' Richard Engel reports.
title: Iran's supreme leader makes new threats against Israel

description: An Ohio, woman broadcast to millions of TikTok viewers this week as she documented the discovery and police investigation of a rolled-up rug buried in her yard.
title: Police say no body was found inside a buried rug that sparked a TikTok sleuth firestorm

description: Is there human-to-human spread of H5N1 bird flu? The CDC is awaiting antibody test results from the Missouri patient and close contacts.
title: Is bird flu spreading in people? Without blood test results, officials can't say

description: During a surprise appearance at the White House press briefing, President Biden was asked about the 2024 presidential election. The president said he expects it will be “free and fair,” but cast doubt on whether it would be “peaceful,” citing former President Trump’s rhetoric.
title: Biden: The election will ‘be free and fair’ but ‘I don’t know whether it will be peaceful’

description: An Illinois woman manipulated her cheating boyfriend to believe he was being threatened by violent drug runners, leading him to slaughter a family of four before killing that tech-savvy girlfriend and himself, police said Thursday.
title: Illinois man manipulated by girlfriend into killing Romeoville family of 4, police say

description: “Golden Bachelorette,” breakout star Charles Ling’s endearing personality had viewers ready to give him the final rose from episode one.
title: ‘Golden Bachelorette’ fan favorite Charles Ling had no idea he’s the internet’s current boyfriend

description: Mitch Kolbe, an artist living in Fairview, N.C., described the devastation Helene left in his community as "total chaos." Kolbe helped WBIR reporter Abby Ham journey over nearly impassable roads to survey the damage.
title: 'It changed this landscape forever': North Carolina community left in shambles by Helene

description: NBC News' chief foreign correspondent Richard Engel reports from Tyre, a city in southern Lebanon which has been almost entirely evacuated due to Israeli airstrikes. Israel says it is trying to create a buffer zone in southern Lebanon free of Hezbollah, but few civilians are there as a result.
title: Richard Engel reports from near-empty Tyre as Israel continues Lebanon strikes

description: The Los Angeles District Attorney’s office has agreed to review new evidence in the 35-year-old case of Erik and Lyle Menendez. Meanwhile, Kim Kardashian has published a personal essay calling for the brothers, who are currently serving life sentences, to be released. NBC's Chloe Melas reports for TODAY.
title: Prosecutors to review new evidence in Menendez brothers case

description: Across the South, communities are continuing to grapple with the fallout from historic levels of rain and violent winds as the search for the missing continues. NBC’s Sam Brock reports for TODAY.
title: Death toll from Hurricane Helene reaches grim new milestone

description: Israel unleashed a new wave of airstrikes across Lebanon on an underground bunker in Beirut, targeting senior leaders of Hezbollah. Israeli officials say they aim to “destroy Hezbollah’s capabilities.” NBC’s chief foreign correspondent Richard Engel reports for TODAY.
title: Israel unleashes airstrikes in Lebanon targeting Hezbollah leaders

description: Former President Donald Trump is set to return to Butler, Pa., the site where he nearly lost his life in July, holding a rally Saturday.
title: 'A huge opportunity': Trump returns to Butler for a high-profile rally

description: Former President Barack Obama will campaign for Vice President Kamala Harris in Pittsburgh next week, his first foray into the election as a battleground-state surrogate.
title: Barack Obama to kick off battleground state blitz for Harris next week in Pennsylvania

description: Even as polling shows the presidential race is a tossup, Vice President Kamala Harris has been running with a measure of risk aversion that some Democratic strategists and activists worry has failed to fully capitalize on the excitement surrounding her entry into the race in July.
title: Harris is playing it safe. Some Democrats worry that could doom her campaign.

description: Huge Israeli strikes hit near Beirut airport; Iran's supreme leader to speak after missile attack
title: Israel targets Hezbollah's presumed new leader in massive Beirut attack
